How To Fetch New Template Packages?

Using the -f/--fetch URI option lets you fetch (install) new templates. More »

Got Templates?

Share your templates. Send a link and announcement to the Free Web Slide Show Alternatives (S5, S6, S9, Slidy And Friends) Forum/Mailing List and get your link added here. Thanks!
